title: Additional Door Adjustment Required
description: During elevator door sensor replacement, discovered that door alignment also needs adjustment to prevent future issues.
reason: Preventive measure to avoid recurring issues
impact: Minimal time extension, improved long-term reliability

title: Compressor Model Upgrade
description: Original compressor model discontinued. Supplier recommends upgraded model with better efficiency.
reason: Original part discontinued, upgrade offers better efficiency
impact: Slight cost increase, improved energy efficiency

title: Extended Delivery Time
description: Compressor delivery delayed by 2 days due to supplier logistics issues.
reason: Supplier logistics delay beyond our control

title: Additional Documentation Required
description: Inspector requires updated electrical drawings and maintenance logs for the past 2 years.
